name: James Bond 007: Nightfire Game Asset File

description: James Bond 007: Nightfire is a James Bond tie-in game published by Electronic Arts. The Windows version of the game was developed by Gearbox Software. In the game, Bond uncovers an industrialist's plot to conquer the world using a U.S. defense satellite.
The Windows version of the game stores game assets, such as .PNG images, in 007 files. These files are compressed archives.
